title: Military Rogue Watchface
developerAddress: Office #2, 2nd Floor, 37- A, Civic Centre, Bahria Town, Islamabad
description: Rogue is the kind of watchface that will get you on the radar of fashion fanatics. It is a techy watchface that looks like a radar and even scans and beeps like a radar. It makes you feel like you are on a secret military mission and even catches every eye that passes by. The light beam circulating on the outer edge displays seconds and the time is shown in middle of the watch in numbers along with the date. In addition to the cool design it displays some of the frequently used alerts right on your watch screen. You can switch between multiple options to display i.e. watch/mobile battery, unread messages/emails and weather alert. FrillRoid Watch Faces focus is in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and took enormous time to choose the watch colors with soothing effect which ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable.Key custom features:-• Mobile and watch battery health.• Unread emails and unread messages notification.• Weather updates.• Digital military radar design.• Faster recognition with percentages and icons.• Glow design with dark background.• Ambient mode engineered with the latest wear Api makes your watch’s battery stronger than everThis watch face is for round/circular smart watches such as the Motorola Moto 360, LG G WATCH R and LG watch Urbane. Visit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frillroid.com.How it works?It’s simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen. Open Settings from Android Wear app to customize the Watch Face. Get this app now and provide us your feedback :)
descriptionHTML:
Rogue is the kind of watchface that will get you on the radar of fashion fanatics. It is a techy watchface that looks like a radar and even scans and beeps like a radar. It makes you feel like you are on a secret military mission and even catches every eye that passes by.
The light beam circulating on the outer edge displays seconds and the time is shown in middle of the watch in numbers along with the date. In addition to the cool design it displays some of the frequently used alerts right on your watch screen. You can switch between multiple options to display i.e. watch/mobile battery, unread messages/emails and weather alert.
FrillRoid Watch Faces focus is in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and took enormous time to choose the watch colors with soothing effect which ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable.
Key custom features:-

• Mobile and watch battery health.
• Unread emails and unread messages notification.
• Weather updates.
• Digital military radar design.
• Faster recognition with percentages and icons.
• Glow design with dark background.
• Ambient mode engineered with the latest wear Api makes your watch’s battery stronger than ever
This watch face is for round/circular smart watches such as the Motorola Moto 360, LG G WATCH R and LG watch Urbane. Visit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frillroid.com.
How it works?
It’s simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen. Open Settings from Android Wear app to customize the Watch Face. Get this app now and provide us your feedback :)
comments: Won't sync change settings and won't let me get to other apps

Refund!!! Amazing how I have found watch faces that are soooo much better than this, and they don't cost a penny. Don't take this watch at face value (pun intended), it might look cool but the interface is dreadfully poor. Stick to the free ones.
